doc:
Peter Lupus III https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Lupus_III 0 Peter Lupus Jr (born June 17, 1932) is an American bodybuilder and actor. He attended the Jordan College of Fine Arts at Butler University, where he also played football and basketball, graduating in 1954. He and his wife, Sharon, have a son, Peter Lupus III, who is also an actor. Peter_Lupus_Jr ( born June_17_,_1932 ) is an_American_bodybuilder_and_actor . He attended the_Jordan_College of Fine_Arts at Butler_University , where he also played football_and_basketball , graduating in 1954 . He and his_wife , Sharon , have a_son , Peter_Lupus_III , who is also an_actor .
